Hellpeon smirked as the energy and shots came towards him. The field 
that he had made before once again took in all the energy and shots 
before flowing into Hellpeon making his eyes glow a dark red.

Hellpeon: "YOu should know something... Chaochitan energy has odd 
after affects once absorbed by any other then the Bamphomet and his 
elite. And since your friend or shield there absorbed it he is about 
to feel some after effects. Chaochitan energy leaves residual amounts 
left in the bodies of those taking it in. And that... is your fatal 
flaw for I can manipulate the energy..."

Hellpeon laughed evily as suddenly all the residual energy in guarda 
began to grow unstable and then exploded within it. At the same time 
that barrier protecting hellpeon also faded.

Elsewhere at the Chivtron base the left head of Gemini fired an Ice 
beam at Unitro and Shockwave. As Zero finally reached and enter the 
chivtron base.
